CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(Month__c, 'January') , 1, IF(ISPICKVAL(Month__c, 'February'), 2, IF(ISPICKVAL(Month__c, 'March'), 3, IF(ISPICKVAL(Month__c, 'April'), 4, IF(ISPICKVAL(Month__c, 'May'), 5, IF(ISPICKVAL(Month__c, 'June'), 6, IF(ISPICKVAL(Month__c, 'July'), 7, IF(ISPICKVAL(Month__c, 'August'), 8, IF(ISPICKVAL(Month__c, 'September'), 9, IF(ISPICKVAL(Month__c, 'October'), 10, IF(ISPICKVAL(Month__c, 'November'), 11, 12)))))))))))
CustomField.label: Month(In number)
